name: Small Dead World
description:
Our first attempt on Ludum Dare Game Jam.

Theme: A Small World (Ludum Dare #38)

"It's a small world after all.... But everyone you know is now zombie. Do you want to survive or do you want to join them? The choice is yours!"

This game is sidescroller platformer-shooter game where protagonist needs to survive and kills as much zombie as he can.

Created by Mliit & Orcdraco

-------------------------------
HOW TO PLAY
------------------------------

Space: Jump
X: use gun (shoot zombie)
